## Before You Submit This PR

**Have you read [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)?**

If not, here's the summary: This is a **personal portfolio**. You can't add your own work experience to my resume. That would beâ€¦ weird.

**However**, PRs are absolutely welcome for:
- Fixing typos
- Fixing broken links
- Improving documentation clarity
- Updating outdated information
- Formatting improvements
- Adding missing attribution

**PRs that will be closed:**
- Adding your own case studies to my portfolio
- Changing my work history
- Updating statistics I generated from my own work

Still here? Great. Fill out the template below.

## Important Reminders

**For job opportunities**: This PR won't generate new portfolio content. Actual employment will. [Contact me on LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/gallem/) instead.

**For security issues**: If this PR addresses confidential data exposure, thank you for handling it responsibly.

**For everything else**: Appreciate the contribution! Quality portfolios benefit from community feedback.
